title: Ji-Woong Chung
text: I am a Professor of Finance at Korea University Business School. My research examines the operations, governance, and regulation of the asset management industry, including mutual funds, private equity funds, and hedge funds.

title: Teaching
text:
Investments 투자론
Derivatives 파생상품
Alternative Investments: Economics of Private Equity 사모펀드
Financial Management 재무관리
Corporate Finance 기업재무
International Financial Management 국제재무관리
FMB819: R을 이용한 데이터 분석
